home.text_base_description: Radiant and revitalized corner unit condo! Remodeled and richly adorned, this 1BR/1BA opulent home provides sheer comfort, an ideal location, and unparalleled cityscape views from the rooftop! Conveniently situated between Nob Hill, Union Square, and City Hall, you experience the very best of San Francisco, while having it all in a full-service building. Once inside, you are greeted with an open floor plan and tons of luminous flowing light. Eco-friendly engineered hardwood flooring spans the entirety of the living space, and the gourmet kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, and a center island w/ seating. Find serenity in the evening in the sizeable bedroom or opt to leisurely work from home. Relish in the external closet organization system and the chic full bathroom featuring a shower/tub combo. Other features include 1-parking space, additional storage, common roof deck, and walk score of 99 with steps away from Union Square, and much more!
